mapper.sql: strainNo, sampleNo, strainCategory, strainType, strainAlias, strainStorageDate, operator, serotype, strainMLST, strainPLG, strainParter, strainRemarks, gramStain, addTime, addUser
mapper.select:
select st.strainNo, st.sampleNo, st.strainCategory, st.strainType, st.strainAlias, st.strainStorageDate, st.operator, st.serotype, st.strainMLST, st.strainPLG, st.strainParter, st.strainRemarks, st.gramStain, sam.farmName,sam.sampleFarmAddr,sam.sampleAnimalAge,sam.sampleSource, sam.sampleCollector,sam.sampleMedicalHistory,c.partName from straincoding st left join sample sam on sam.sampleNo = st.sampleNo left join collectionpart c on sam.sampleCollectionPart = c.partNo where st.strainNo in
#{no}

select count(strainNo) from straincoding
and strainNo like '%' #{strainno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
and sampleNo like '%' #{sampleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
and strainCategory in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and strainType in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and strainAlias like '%' #{strainalias,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
and operator like '%' #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
and serotype like '%' #{serotype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
and strainMLST like '%' #{strainmlst,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
and strainPLG like '%' #{strainplg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
and strainParter like '%' #{strainparter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
and strainStorageDate >= #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}
and strainStorageDate <= #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}
select from straincoding s where strainNo like #{no}

select s.strainNo from straincoding s where strainNo not in (select distinct sm.strainNo from strainmic sm)
and gramStain like #{gram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select s.strainNo from straincoding s where strainNo not in (select distinct sc.strainNo from straincharacter sc)
mapper.delete:
delete from straincoding where strainNo in
#{strainno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into straincoding
strainNo,
sampleNo,
strainCategory,
strainType,
strainAlias,
strainStorageDate,
operator,
serotype,
strainMLST,
strainPLG,
strainParter,
strainRemarks,
gramStain,
addTime,
addUser,
#{strainno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sampleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{straincategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{straintype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{strainalias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{strainstoragedate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serotype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{strainmlst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{strainplg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{strainparter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{strainremarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gramstain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update straincoding
strainAlias = #{strainalias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
strainStorageDate = #{strainstoragedate,jdbcType=DATE},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serotype = #{serotype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
strainMLST = #{strainmlst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
strainPLG = #{strainplg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
strainParter = #{strainparter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
strainRemarks = #{strainremarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gramStain = #{gramstain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where strainNo = #{strainno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
